solution_line_template: The third dart earned Don {bullseye_points} / {half_divisor} = <<{bullseye_points}/{half_divisor}={third_dart_points}>>{third_dart_points} points.
Thus, his total score is {bullseye_points} + {missed_points} + {third_dart_points} = <<{bullseye_points}+{missed_points}+{third_dart_points}={total_score}>>{total_score} points.
